name: springily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that returns quickly to the usual shape after being pulled, pushed, etc.: Everything, including the springily delicious bagels, is made from scratch. The thick carpets were springily soft under my feet.
in a way that is full of movement and energy: He walked springily down the main road towards the office. This version of the well-known opera is springily urgent.
More examplesFewer examplesBarefoot runners used a softer stride, landing springily on the ball of the foot instead of hard on the heel.She rose springily from her chair, and rushed to the door. He plays a springily athletic superhero.
